name: Offensive Plug-In A
effect: While you have a Tamer in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.[Main] 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
security_effect: [Security] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 Tamer card among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, add this card to your hand.
